attributes.action: Ask MPs to debate school admission places for catchment only residents
attributes.background: Because my catchment school has no places left so I have to go out of my catchment .and too many parents out of catchment get a choice to go to school out of their area .

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
